summary: A young Russian woman, smuggled into America by human traffickers, must fight for her life in order to derail the traffickers' plans.
cast: Natasha Rinis|Sayed Badreya|Philip Willingham|Raul Torres|Daria Andrews|Xavier Fan|Vaughn Goland|Israel Hernandez|Misha Kuznetsov|Robin Madel|Elizabetta T. Malagon|Dave Powers|Roman Roytberg|Seth Ruffer|Darja Schabad|Adrian Luke Sinclair|Anita Storr|Alex Trubetskoy|Julia Zgoda
title: Cargo
